Title: Lengthens the period of time for the filing of medical malpractice cases based upon allegations of reckless use of a syringe, needle or other sharp
Summary: Lengthens the period of time for the filing of medical malpractice cases based upon allegations of reckless use of a syringe, needle or other sharp.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to lengthening the period of time for the filing of medical malpractice cases based upon allegations of reckless use of a syringe, needle or other sharp
